Verses: 1 isravelin Raajaavaagiya Yovaagaasin Kumaaran Yovaasudaiya Irandaam Varushaththile Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yovaasin Kumaaran Amadhsiyaa Raajaavaanaan.
2 avan Raajaavaagirapodhu Irubaththaindhu Vayadhaayirundhu, Erusalemile Irubaththonbadhu Varusham Raajyabaaram Panninaan; Erusalem Nagaraththaalaana Avan Thaayin Per Yovadhaanaal.
3 avan Karththarin Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhai Seydhaan; Aanaalum Than Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhaippolalla; Than Thagappanaagiya Yovaas Seydhapadiyellaam Seydhaan.
4 medaigal Maaththiram Agatrappadavillai; Janangal Innum Medaigalinmel Baliyittuth Thoobankaattivandhaargal.
5 raajyabaaram Avan Kaiyile Sthirappattapodhu, Avanudaiya Thagappanaagiya Raajaavaik Kondrupotta Than Oozhiyakkaararaik Kondrupottaan.

6 aanaalum Pillaigalinimiththam Pidhaakkal Kolaiseyyappadaamalum Pidhaakkalinimiththam Pillaigal Kolaiseyyappadaamalum, Avanavan Seydha Paavaththinimiththam Avanavan Kolaiseyyappadavendum Endru Moseyin Nyaayappramaana Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Karththar Kattalaiyitta
